Posts.Content: I'm now over a month out of treatment.  when I had burns, my radiation nurse gave me samples of aquphor.  It was messy to use, but worked quite well.  I alternated a lotion that I've used all along, aloe vera, and vit e. my current problem now is that the skin is now quite tender, and I"m not sure what to put on it now, if anything.  It gets itchybut when I rub it . . I can tell that is NOT a good thing.
Posts.Title: Radiation Burns
